meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of frogs or toads.
meanings.sent1: The pond was filled with batrachian creatures hopping around happily.
meanings.sent2: The batrachian features of the frog made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent3: The batrachian party in the garden seemed to be croaking out a song.
meanings.sent4: Her batrachian smile was as infectious as a frog's leap.
meanings.sent5: The batrachian skin of the toad felt cool and smooth to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The little girl caught a batrachian by the pond and observed it closely.
meanings.sent2: In the biology class, they studied the anatomy of a batrachian.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the batrachian hopping in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The prince in the fairy tale was transformed into a batrachian by an evil spell.
meanings.sent5: The loud croak of the batrachian echoed through the swamp, signaling the start of the evening.
